scripts.h5p-pack:all: h5p pack h5p-bildetema h5p-bildetema-words-grid-view/ h5p-bildetema-words-topic-image/ h5p-editor-bildetema-words-topic-image/ all.h5p
scripts.pack-and-update-wordpress: npm run h5p-pack:all && npm run update-wordpress
scripts.bump-and-build: npm run bump-library && npm run generate-library
scripts.postinstall: concurrently 'npm install --prefix h5p-bildetema' 'npm install --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-grid-view' 'npm install --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-topic-image' 'npm install --prefix h5p-editor-bildetema-words-topic-image'
scripts.start: concurrently 'npm start --prefix h5p-bildetema' 'npm start --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-grid-view' 'npm start --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-topic-image' 'npm start --prefix h5p-editor-bildetema-words-topic-image'
scripts.build: concurrently 'npm run build --prefix h5p-bildetema' 'npm run build --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-grid-view' 'npm run build --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-topic-image' 'npm run build --prefix h5p-editor-bildetema-words-topic-image'
scripts.generate-library: concurrently 'npm run generate-library --prefix h5p-bildetema' 'npm run generate-library --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-grid-view' 'npm run generate-library --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-topic-image' 'npm run generate-library --prefix h5p-editor-bildetema-words-topic-image'
scripts.test: concurrently 'vitest run' 'npm test --prefix h5p-bildetema' 'npm test --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-grid-view' 'npm test --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-topic-image' 'npm test --prefix h5p-editor-bildetema-words-topic-image'
scripts.test:watch: concurrently 'vitest' 'npm run test:watch --prefix h5p-bildetema' 'npm run test:watch --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-grid-view' 'npm test:watch --prefix h5p-bildetema-words-topic-image' 'npm test:watch --prefix h5p-editor-bildetema-words-topic-image'
